Html:
Can I use emf images with FONET?

I would like to render emf images using external-graphic tag,

But I am getting exception while running following is code,

<fo:external-graphic height="20mm"  content-width="57mm" content-type="image/emf" >

<xsl:attribute name="src">

<xsl:value-of select="Logo"/>

</xsl:attribute>

</fo:external-graphic>

Where 'Logo' is the URL of the emf image.

It says content-type is invalid attribute!!
